OOC: is Robert, Im at rAuq's house so I'll post from here for tonight.

BIC:
Menasor feels the stabing pain in his back, the metal rupturing 
under the claws of his attackers, and reacts, without logic or 
reason, it is pure instinct, "Destroy.....Maximal" he screams, he 
uses his huge arms to propell himself up, and flails his arms 
outwards, trying to hit his captors. He then sees Firearm, and 
remembers Astroblast's orders, he grabs for him again.
